com.metaio.sdk.jni

Class GestureHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metaio.sdk.jni.GestureHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GestureHandlerAndroid

    public class GestureHandler
extends Object
    GestureHandler base class, the applications should use platform specific implementations, i.e. None GestureHandlerAndroid or GestureHandlerIOS

        Parameters:
        singleControl - True if can be controlled individually, false otherwise. See: getSingleControl

      • getSingleControl

        public boolean getSingleControl()
        Test if the geometries can be controlled individually. True if geometries are controlled individually, false otherwise. See: enablePickability

      • setRotationAxis

        public void setRotationAxis(char axis)
        Set the rotation axis that the rotation gesture applies to.
        Parameters:
        axis - axis that should be enabled, i.e. 'x', 'y' or 'z' (default). See: getRotationAxis

      • getRotationAxis

        public char getRotationAxis()
        Get the rotation axis that rotation gestures can be applied to. The rotation axis that is enabled, i.e. 'x', 'y' or 'z' See: setRotationAxis

                      int group)
        Add an object to the gesture handler with an option to group them.
        Parameters:
        geometry - A pointer to the geometry to be added.
        group - The group which geometry should belong to. See: removeObject, removeObjects See: getAllObjects

                                    int x,
                                    int y)
        Select all the objects in the same group and record their initial states.
        Parameters:
        group - The group number of the selected object.
        x - The x coordinate of the touch point.
        y - The y coordinate of the touch point.

      • touchesBegan

        public void touchesBegan(int x,
                         int y)
        Go through the vector to select all touched objects if they are controlled individually, and select all objects if they are not.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the touch point.
        y - The y coordinate of the touch point.

      • touchesMoved

        public void touchesMoved(int x,
                         int y)
        Move all the objects if they are selected.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the touch point.
        y - The y coordinate of the touch point.

      • touchesEnded

        public void touchesEnded(int x,
                         int y)
        Reset all the objects in the vector to not selected.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the touch point.
        y - The y coordinate of the touch point.

      • handlePinchGesture

        public void handlePinchGesture(float scale)
        Go through the vector to change the scale of the geometries if they are selected.
        Parameters:
        scale - The new scale of the geometry.

      • handleRotateGesture

        public void handleRotateGesture(float rotation)
        Go through the vector to change the rotation of the geometries if they are selected.
        Parameters:
        rotation - The new rotation that should be applied to the axis.
